traits.Damage Transfer: While attached to a creature, the cloaker takes only half the damage dealt to it (rounded down). and that creature takes the other half.
traits.False Appearance: While the cloaker remains motionless without its underside exposed, it is indistinguishable from a dark leather cloak.
traits.Light Sensitivity: While in bright light, the cloaker has disadvantage on attack rolls and Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
